Package eu.tivian.software

Class SimpleCPU

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.tivian.hardware.MOS8501
      • eu.tivian.software.SimpleCPU
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CPU
    public class SimpleCPU
extends MOS8501
    Special version of MOS8501 with simple memory management.
    Meant for debugging.
    Since:
    2020-01-21
    Author:
    Pawe≈Ç Kania

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SimpleCPU()
      Initializes the CPU, disables external RESET and IRQ signal and enables support for undocumented instructions.
